Generative AI
=============

Upstage builds powerful large language models and document processing engines to transform workflows and empower leading businesses like yours.

[Contact us](https://www.upstage.ai/contact-us)[Try now](https://console.upstage.ai/playground?utm_source=web-home&utm_medium=cta-button)

High-performance AI built by experts
------------------------------------

Built and refined by our team of AI experts, our technology brings the highest standards of accuracy and performance to your business.

[![Image 27: Turn Charts into LLM-Actionable Data: Introducing Chart Recognition in Upstage Document Parse](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/679113138d7fb15b1da7a793_MAIN%20IMG_16_9.avif) ### Turn Charts into LLM-Actionable Data: Introducing Chart Recognition in Upstage Document Parse Products Read More](https://www.upstage.ai/blog/en/introducing-chart-recognition-in-upstage-document-parse)

[![Image 28: Solar Pro: The most intelligent LLM on a single GPU—supporting more tasks, languages, and domains](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6763a5cdea653864426e6a81_solarpro_kv_DocVQA(1204).avif) ### Solar Pro: The most intelligent LLM on a single GPU—supporting more tasks, languages, and domains A large language model that delivers the performance of a 70B+ parameter model while running efficiently on a single GPU. Products Read More](https://www.upstage.ai/blog/en/solar-pro)

[![Image 29: Introducing Solar Mini: Compact yet Powerful](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/674a4ccbdd188bc8879dad9e_solar-tech%2Bperformance_WebHero%2BSNS.avif) ### Introducing Solar Mini: Compact yet Powerful Welcome to the era of Solar, a pre-trained Large Language Model from Upstage. Products Read More](https://www.upstage.ai/blog/en/introducing-solar-mini-compact-yet-powerful)

Empowering the future of work
-----------------------------

From information extraction and fact-checking to enterprise search and document generation, our AI solutions deliver unmatched precision for your most demanding workflows.

[Insurance](https://www.upstage.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[Finance](https://www.upstage.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[Healthcare](https://www.upstage.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)[Legal](https://www.upstage.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3)

 

An automated insurance claims processing solution achieving 99.9% accuracy through advanced OCR and Solar LLM technologies. It streamlines data extraction, validation, and correction while integrating into existing workflows, proven to lower costs by 70%.

[Learn more](https://www.upstage.ai/solutions/insurance-claims-automation)

 

A fact-checking solution tailored for analysis reports, utilizing client data and web search to verify content accuracy. Powered by Solar LLM, it delivers well-grounded insights accompanied by supporting reference documents for enhanced transparency.

 

A QA service for _pharmaceutical related information ingredient_ inquiries, ensuring precise answers with multiple sources of truth. By combining internal client data and web search based on Solar LLM, it provides clear, source-backed insights for reliable decision-making.

 

Summarization and contract drafting powered by Solar LLM, optimizing case handling and reducing manual workload. This solution accelerates processes, offering measurable savings in both time and costs, while ensuring reliable outcomes for legal and business needs.

Trusted by leading companies worldwide
--------------------------------------

Join top businesses that rely on Upstage to focus on what matters most, taking their workflows to the next level.

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/675a49061de3b7cb4aecfb19_%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%AB%E1%84%83%E1%85%B3%E1%84%87%E1%85%A5%E1%84%83%E1%85%B3_V3.avif)

### “Solar enhances our Smart Assistant, transforming enterprise support and customer service efficiency.”

“Solar enhances our Smart Assistant, transforming enterprise support and customer service efficiency.”

We anticipate offering solutions that fully leverage the potential of generative AI by combining Smart Assistant with Solar. It will become a game-changer for companies aiming for more innovative enterprise support services and customer experiences.

John Kim

CEO and Co-founder of Sendbird

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/675a49061de3b7cb4aecfb19_%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%AB%E1%84%83%E1%85%B3%E1%84%87%E1%85%A5%E1%84%83%E1%85%B3_V3.avif)

![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/677be7674351005d25188867_FriendlyAI_V3.avif)

### “Upstage’s cutting-edge AI model, Solar, powers our infrastructure, enabling businesses to adopt advanced AI at optimal costs.”

“Upstage’s cutting-edge AI model, Solar, powers our infrastructure, enabling businesses to adopt advanced AI at optimal costs.”

We are thrilled to combine Upstage’s Solar with FriendlyAI’s top-tier AI infrastructure. This partnership empowers businesses to leverage state-of-the-art AI solutions efficiently. FriendlyAI and Upstage are committed to driving generative AI innovation for enterprises.

Byung-Gon Chun

CEO, FriendlyAI

![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/677be7674351005d25188867_FriendlyAI_V3.avif)

![Image 34: Law&Company](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6777a7125201c2594557cec7_Law%26Company_V3.avif)

### “Solar-Legal-LNC streamlines legal data analysis, delivering unmatched accuracy and efficiency.”

“Solar-Legal-LNC streamlines legal data analysis, delivering unmatched accuracy and efficiency.”

Through our collaboration with Upstage, Solar-Legal-LNC outperforms GPT-4 by 25% in specialized Korean legal tasks. Even in on-premise environments, it significantly boosts legal professionals’ productivity and improves the accuracy of legal data analysis. This model plays a key role in driving digital innovation in legal services.

Kisun Ahn

Director of Legal AI Research Center and Lawyer

![Image 35: Law&Company](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6777a7125201c2594557cec7_Law%26Company_V3.avif)

![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/67ca810d7c98ae472d82bdf7_Kbank_V4.png)

### “Solar-Finance automates financial operations, achieving over 80% productivity gains.”

“Solar-Finance automates financial operations, achieving over 80% productivity gains.”

Since adopting Solar-Finance, K-Bank has transformed internal operations, enhancing both general performance and finance-specific tasks. With stable and reliable AI-powered banking, we confidently launch specialized services that deliver measurable outcomes.

Hongjong Kim

Head of Data & AI Services Team, K-Bank

![Image 37](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/67ca810d7c98ae472d82bdf7_Kbank_V4.png)

![Image 38: Hanwha Life](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/675a492aafefdd33949a36c1_%E1%84%92%E1%85%A1%E1%86%AB%E1%84%92%E1%85%AA%E1%84%85%E1%85%A1%E1%84%8B%E1%85%B5%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3_V3.avif)

### “Upstage OCR delivers over 95% accuracy, revolutionizing document processing.”

“Upstage OCR delivers over 95% accuracy, revolutionizing document processing.”

Unlike traditional solutions with limited OCR capabilities, Upstage’s AI achieves unmatched precision across document types. With enhanced model performance and broader commercial applications, we rely on Upstage for scalable, high-accuracy document automation.

Gyeong-won Jeon

Data Analytics Team Leader

![Image 39: Hanwha Life](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/675a492aafefdd33949a36c1_%E1%84%92%E1%85%A1%E1%86%AB%E1%84%92%E1%85%AA%E1%84%85%E1%85%A1%E1%84%8B%E1%85%B5%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3_V3.avif)

![Image 40: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99e37/67618aeaf3e11b9fd734ffb6_left-arrow-line-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)

![Image 41: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99e37/67618aeaf3e11b9fd734ffb8_right-arrow-line-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)

![Image 42](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99e37/675695c7632351aaddbf0330_Leaf_left.svg)

Proven excellence in AI
-----------------------

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99e37/675695e5f2b109574041695c_Leaf_right.svg)

Our achievements highlight our commitment to innovation and quality,  
‍with global awards and industry-leading rankings.

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6745f0cd1642edf4a13dff8e_Screenshot%202024-11-26%20at%208.00.18%E2%80%AFAM.avif)

### 100+

##### Top-tier conference papers

We have published papers in top AI conferences like ECCV, NAACL, CVPR, ICLR, AAAI, NeurIPS, EMNLP, ACL, and RecSys, advancing key areas of AI research.

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6745f0cd1642edf4a13dff8e_Screenshot%202024-11-26%20at%208.00.18%E2%80%AFAM.avif)

### 1st place

##### Open LLM Leaderboard

The Open LLM Leaderboard on Hugging Face serves as a vital resource for the AI community, offering a comprehensive and up-to-date evaluation of open Large Language Models.

![Image 46](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6743d5190bb2b52f38e99ecd/6745f0cd1642edf4a13dff8e_Screenshot%202024-11-26%20at%208.00.18%E2%80%AFAM.avif)

### Winner

##### ICDAR 2023 Winner

ICDAR is the leading international conference on document analysis, covering text recognition, graphics analysis, document understanding, historical archives, and scene text analysis.
